snippet.title: THIRSTY SUITORS | Gameplay Overview
snippet.description:
The team at Outerloop Games talks about what to expect in Thirsty Suitors, coming soon to Xbox, PlayStation, Switch, and Steam. PC demo available now: https://bit.ly/ThirstySteamDemo_YT

Can Jala learn to love herself and heal the wounds of her past? Thirsty Suitors is a stylish, story-driven adventure that unfolds through turn-based battles, skateboarding, and cooking.

Developed by OUTERLOOP GAMES. Published by Annapurna Interactive. 

© Annapurna Interactive, 2022
